title: Dragon Hybrid
prompt: Epic cinematic portrait of a man morphing into a dragon hybrid, scales growing on the skin, glowing reptilian eyes, horns forming. Background shifting from a studio into a volcanic mountain landscape with fire and smoke.

title: Shadow Assassin
prompt: Cinematic dark transformation of a man into a shadow assassin, face dissolving into smoke, glowing red eyes emerging from the darkness. Background morphing from a city street into a shadowy alley with neon lights.

title: Ice Titan
prompt: Epic cinematic transformation of a man into an ice titan, body turning into ice and crystal, glowing blue cracks forming. Background shifting from a modern room into a frozen tundra with snowstorm and aurora borealis.

title: Stone Golem
prompt: Epic cinematic transformation of a man into a stone golem, skin turning to cracked rock with glowing blue veins, moss and roots growing from the body. Background shifting into an ancient temple in ruins. Hyperrealistic dramatic lighting.

title: Angel vs Demon
prompt: Cinematic portrait of a man half transformed into an angel with glowing white light and feathers, the other half a demon with horns, dark cracks, and flames. Background split between a heavenly sky and an infernal hellscape.

title: Samurai Spirit
prompt: Hyperrealistic cinematic transformation of a man into a samurai spirit, glowing armor forming around the body, ethereal kanji symbols floating in the air. Background: Japanese mountain landscape at sunset.

title: Mecha Pilot
prompt: Epic cinematic transformation of a man fusing into a futuristic mecha suit, glowing visor and mechanical arms extending. Sparks, neon reflections, and a sci-fi hangar background. Hyper-detailed lighting.
